0.1.name: wordpress/top-social-bookmarking-buttons
0.1.description: The plugins contais the top social bookmarking buttons on the net. Post your articles to the social bookmarking sites and get traffic. The plugin supports SociBook.com, Digg.com, Google.com, Delicious, StumbleUpon, Yahoo Buzz and FaceBook. The installation is easy, it takes up to 1-2 mins. You can view the screenshots here: Screenshot-1 Screenshot-2
